entry.title: Ubuntu LTS Packaging?
entry.summary: Oliver Egginger inquired about any updates regarding Bitcoin on April 12, 2014 and shared a link to the official website of Bitcoin. Wladimir replied that the only alteration in version 0.9.1 was OpenSSL's dependency version used in the binary gitian builds. However, the PPA build is reliant on the operating system OpenSSL, so upgrading it should suffice.
